item.description: Seacoast Spanish speakers of all ages and levels are welcome! Please bring a favorite text (or a dictionary) or other material (e.g., travel photos) if you wish to share it with the group and stimulate discussion.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Alberto and his diccionario at a table on the restaurant side of Popovers.
item.why: Come join our conversation to improve your Spanish language skills. Vénganse a conversar para amejorar su conocimiento del idioma español.

group.name: The NH Seacoast Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The NH Seacoast Spanish Language Meetup
